text: Charles Wilson Buttz (November 16, 1837 â€“ July 20, 1913) was a U.S. Representative for South Carolina. He was a member of the Republican Party. He was born in Stroudsburg, Pennsylvania. He died in Lisbon, North Dakota. == References == Category:1837 births Category:1913 deaths Category:Politicians from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States representatives from South Carolina
